title: Draymond Ejected, Warriors Still Take Game 1
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss Steph Curry and the Warriors big game 1 win over the Memphis Grizzlies. Listen as Jalen takes you to school and breaks down the Draymond Green ejection. Find out if he agrees with the flagrant 2 call. Celtics get beat by Giannis and the Bucks. Celtics only made 10 2-pointers in the loss as the Celtics had no answers for the Bucks interior defense. Plus, Joel Embiid is out for game 1 and 2 against the Heat. There is no replacing Embiid but find out who needs to step up if Philly even has a shot in this series. Also, the Phoenix Suns take on the Dallas Mavericks. CP3 vs Luka may be the marquee matchup but find out which matchup is the most important. And social media was alive talking about Jalen’s suit this weekend. GQ Jalen breaks down and educates about his style. All this and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
